name: RaftyCrafty
description:
This game is made for the Wowie Game Jam in only 3.5 days.

Gameplay:

Protect the bot so he can farm resources. Once you've got enough, you can build a raft with the button in the bottom left corner and go to the next island.

Controls:

    - Control with WASD

    - Your sword aims to your mouse

    - Hit with Left Mouse Button

Credits:

    - Most is done by me

    - Some sounds by dustyroom (Our projects - Dustyroom)

    - Music by Jonas Tyroller (https://www.youtube.com/c/JonasTyroller)
